name: BOXING (itch) (TYPH3U5)
description:
I was inspired by an episode of SpongeBob to make a game about boxing. This is the final result. This is my magnum opus.
Controls:
Space to start game a restart round
Backspace to go back to character select

Player 1:
WASD to move (and change character in character select)
G to punch

Player 2:
Arrow Keys to move (and change character in character select)
Numpad 0 to punch

Game made with GameMaker Studio 2.
